message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product. It holds great value to me, and I believe it could be valuable to you as well. I'm offering it to you for $120. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?
